snippet: Several of the Liverpool team that went down meekly 3-1 at struggling Leicester City on Monday are playing well below their best, manager Juergen Klopp said on Friday, admitting a quick reaction was needed to get their season back on track....

headline.main: Film 'Trespass Against Us' Sees Fassbender Tackle Family Woes, Crime
headline.print_headline: Film 'Trespass Against Us' Sees Fassbender Tackle Family Woes, Crime

lead_paragraph: Several of the Liverpool team that went down meekly 3-1 at struggling Leicester City on Monday are playing well below their best, manager Juergen Klopp said on Friday, admitting a quick reaction was needed to get their season back on track.
